text:
There is a log used in org.apache.tomcat.bayeux.request.PublishRequest,but it was not be defined,so the class can not be complied successfully,there should be something like this?

private static final Log log = LogFactory.getLog(PublishRequest.class);
creator: wujunchen@gmail.com

text:
Thanks for the report. I suspect the recent exercise making logs final and private broke this since RequestBase does have a log.

I've added a log to PublishRequest and cleaned up the imports as well.
creator: markt@apache.org
